resources.string:
Tip:
Select the desired overclock frequency from the dropdown at the top. Then press "Apply" to instantly activate the chosen overclock frequency. If you would like to make this overclock frequency apply at each future reboot, press "Save."

Note:
By pressing "Apply," the current undervoltage setting for the overclock frequency WILL be reset! Please launch Control Freak, Voltage Control, or your favorite oc/uv app to re-apply the undervolt setting.

Pressing "Save" will remove your previously saved oc/uv settings, to prevent improper application of oc/uv values at the next boot. Please launch Control Freak, Voltage Control, or your favorite oc/uv app to re-apply/re-save your desired settings.
